content: App was good, I was using the card in Malaysia for 3months now and all of a sudden they informed that it won't be working again till further notice , within a day it stopped fortunately I could withdraw cash before that , but it won't be the case for everyone and it's not fair if we completely depend on a card when we're out of India and this happens . Kindly rectify it ASAP Thank you...looking forward to start using the niyo again for international transactions.
replyContent: Hi Anand, we're happy to inform you that RBI has issued a relaxation with regards to the 23rd Jan circular stopping international transactions. International ATM, POS, and Tap & Pay transactions are now allowed on your SBM Niyo Global Debit Card. We're also working with the bank to restart ECom transactions as soon as possible. Thank you!
